reviewText: Watched it once and that was enough. It was interesting.

Glad I bought this DVD.  It reveals a slice of rural Brazil during WWII from the prospective of two unlikely friends.  As with Central Station, you evolve to like and care about the central characters.
I was totally charmed by this Brazilian movie at the Palm Springs Film Festival. Just get it, and you will see. If you liked "Central Station," you will love this movie.
